# MLModelStructure.Program.Binding.value(_:)

**Case**

A constant value in the Program.

## Declaration

```swift
case value(MLModelStructure.Program.Value)
```

## Bindings

- **MLModelStructure.Program.Binding.name(_:)**: The name of the previously defined variable in the Program.
